mapper.select: select sm.menu_id, sm.parent_id, sm.name, sm.url, sm.perms, sm.type, sm.icon, sm.order_num, sm.gmt_create, sm.gmt_modified from sys_menu sm where menu_id = #{menuId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id= #{id}

select sm.menu_id,sm.parent_id,sm.name, sm.url,sm.perms,sm.type,sm.icon, sm.order_num, sm.gmt_modified,sm.gmt_create from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id left join sys_user_role sur on srm.role_id = sur.role_id where sur.user_id = #{id} and sm.type in (0,1) order by sm.parent_id, sm.menu_id
